name: Swarm (itch) (noermel, Kruemelkatze, fJamHub)
description:
Swarm is a game were you are strong together but also when you're apart. Try to dogde these enemies.

If you use the Brave Browser, you need to disable the Brave Shields (right to the address bar) to play the web version.

GitHub Repository

Members of the Swarm:

  • Daniela Meinhardt (Dirty Paws Studio)
  • Fabian Schober (Dirty Paws Studio)
  • Franz Josef Huber
  • Peter Hafele
